member.name: T:TryIT.DataConversion.ConvertString
member.summary: convert string value to other type of value, e.g. convert string date to datetime

member.name: M:TryIT.DataConversion.ConvertString.ToDateTimeWithDefault(System.String,System.DateTime,System.String[])
member.summary: Convert string to datetime, return default value if convert failed
member.param: default datetime value if convert failed
string values's format, if multiple format defined, will return with first valid format which convert success

member.name: M:TryIT.DataConversion.ConvertString.ToDateTime(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Convert string to datetime, return 0001-01-01 if convert failed
member.param: string values's format, if multiple format defined, will return with first valid format which convert success

member.name: M:TryIT.DataConversion.ConvertString.ToInt(System.String)
member.summary:
convert string value to int, return 0 if convert failed
if value is "0", it will be 0 as well

member.name: M:TryIT.DataConversion.ConvertString.TryToInt(System.String)
member.summary:
convert string value to int, return 0 if convert failed
item1: indicator whether convert success, item2: value after convert
if value is "0", it will be 0 as well

member.name: M:TryIT.DataConversion.ConvertString.ToEnum``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: convert string value to Enum item, return defaultEnum if convert failed

member.name: M:TryIT.DataConversion.ConvertString.ToDecimal(System.String,System.Globalization.NumberStyles)
member.summary: try convert string value to decimal value, return null if input value is empty or convert failed, 1% will convert to 0.01
member.param: default to for avoid failure for scientific value, e.g. if data from excel 0.0000159515001096899 will become 1.59515001096899E-05

member.name: M:TryIT.DataConversion.ConvertString.TryToDecimal(System.String,System.Globalization.NumberStyles)
member.summary:
try convert string value to decimal value, return Tuple
item1: indicator whether convert success, item2: value after convert
1% will convert to 0.01
member.param: default to for avoid failure for scientific value, e.g. if data from excel 0.0000159515001096899 will become 1.59515001096899E-05
